structure.unit: STATE UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES -- REGIONAL EDUCATION -- ARCHAEOLOGY

law.text: No member of a governing board of a public institution of postsecondary education shall be held to be a public officer by reason of his membership on the board except as provided in KRS 45A.335 for the purpose of KRS 45A.340.
law.history: Amended 1997 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 87, effective May 30, 1997. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 17, July 1, 1992. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 123, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 392, sec. 3, effective June 17, 1978. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4527-13.
